title: Heritage Grove Sign Unveiling
description: Thousand Oaks Neighborhood Association is pleased to announce the designation of Thousand Oaks Park as a Heritage Grove. Join us as we unveil our new sign and celebrate this special recognition.

title: Creek Clean Up
description: Please join us if you are available for a Creek Clean up Event with the South Bay Clean Creeks Coalition.

title: TONA General Meeting
description: This meeting will feature our Councilmember and Vice Mayor, Pam Foley and the new police captain for our area, Steven Payne.

title: Easter Egg Hunt
description: Dads meet to hide the eggs

title: Easter Egg Hunt
description: Children meet on Normington Way (near the Thousand Oaks Park sign)

title: Easter Bunny
description: Come meet the easter bunny in the playground area

title: Family Picnic
description: Join us for an evening of fun with our neighbors at Thousand Oaks Park

title: 4th of July Parade
description: Enjoy a parade by and for the TONA community.

title: Apple Pie Contest
description: Join your neighbors for a deliciously fun apple pie baking contest as we celebrate Independence Day together!
